post.text: As President I will put America FIRST! #TrumpIsWithYou

comment.author: Crystal
comment.text: What is you're plan? How exactly you're going to make America great again? By banning muslims and building the stupid wall? I dont think so!

replies.author: Nuran
replies.text: What's a great plan in your eyes? Please, do share!!!

replies.author: Monique
replies.text: Lol right! Didn't give a single policy or HOW he's going to do any of the things he's going to do. The fact that people are backing him up and are clueless about his plans makes me worry about America. Of course he had to mention Hillary's emails though. At least we know he'll save us from those haha

replies.author: Kevin
replies.text: Monique Brianna, I hope you consider Trump. At least we know he is not going to be like Hillary who only enriches herself and really don't care about the Americans. Trump will do everything in his power to make USA great!
